meta_description: Capital expenses are strategic investments in long-term assets like machinery and facilities. Understand how CapEx impacts industrial maintenance budgets and ROI.
title: What Are Capital Expenses (CapEx)?

hero_image.alt: Hero image for What Are Capital Expenses (CapEx)?

image_prompt: A wide-angle, high-quality photograph of a modern, clean industrial facility. In the foreground, a diverse group of three professionals—a maintenance manager in a hard hat and high-visibility vest and two corporate executives in business-casual attire—are looking at a tablet together while standing in front of a large, sophisticated robotic assembly arm. The lighting is bright and professional, emphasizing a high-tech, well-funded manufacturing environment. No text.
